org.kepler.profiling.gui

Class ViewWatchingTabPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.kepler.profiling.gui.ViewWatchingTabPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, StateChangeListener, TabPane
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecutionMonitorPanel, WorkflowRunOutlineTabPane

    public class ViewWatchingTabPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TabPane, StateChangeListener
    A tab pane that knows when its containing view is selected.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
